name: Fall 2016 - 470 - Tales Of Adventure
description:
All donations go directly to the Computer Graphics Club at Chico State, less a 10% donation to Itch.IO for hosting services

CONTROLLER NEEDED TO PLAY!

Adventure with your buddy to face the onslaught of the attack of slimes to face the boss of all slimes. Work together or work separately the slime has no mercy and will always come to face you in battle. Protect the land with your sword and your faith and maybe someday the land will be freed to the vile creatures known as the slime. Hopefully one day the people of this land will be able to sleep safely for once.

Take on this classic RPG inspired hack and slash and fight all the slimes to bring peace to the land. Travel through the many levels to reach the end, however, do you have what it takes to beat them.

Credits

Page 34 Studios

Vincent Lo - Design lead

Thaddeus Thompson - Programmer

William Walker - Art lead

Number of players

2 players (CO-OP)

Video trailer

https://youtu.be/hpR7FJDOtuc

Installation instructions for you game

open the zip and extract the file

run the .exe

Download Link (if the main link does not work)
